Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Ago \A*go"\, a. & adv. [OE. ago, agon, p. p. of agon to go away, pass by, AS. [=a]g[=a]n to pass away; [=a]- (cf. Goth. us-, Ger. er-, orig. meaning out) + g[=a]n to go. See {Go}.] Past; gone by; since; as, ten years ago; gone long ago. [1913 Webster]
ago adj : gone by; or in the past; "two years ago"; "`agone' is an archaic word for `ago'" [syn: {agone}] adv : in the past; "long ago"; "sixty years ago my grandfather came to the U.S."
